name: Laynie Foundation
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Laynie Foundation is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Matteson, IL. From 2018-02 through 2019-01, this provider received $146K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 368 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 80% of billing is concentrated in H0004 (H0004), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-01, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
